actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 101-322.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 594.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel the Lady Rose Anne.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.

titles.title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel the Lady Rose Anne.
